title: Richard Thompson - Electric (Deluxe Edition) (2013)
description:

Richard ThompsonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s latest album, Electric, produced by Buddy Miller, comes in what is arguably his most creatively productive period in a career that stretches back some 45 years, back to his emergence as a teen guitarist and songwriter with the groundbreaking Fairport ConventionÃ¢â‚¬â€the band that essentially invented the term Ã¢â‚¬Å“English folk-rock.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ And thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s saying a lot, with his dozens of albums consistently high on critics polls and guitar skills that have earned him a Top 20 spot on Rolling StoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s list of Best Guitarists of All Time.

Richard ThompsonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s many facets only seem to get more, well, multifaceted. And multi-fascinating. The recognition continues and has become even stronger in the last few years: his long-acclaimed guitar workÃ¢â‚¬â€piercing, delicate, often both at onceÃ¢â‚¬â€brought him MOJO magazineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Les Paul Award, his equally gripping songwriting earned him the 2012 Americana Music AssociationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Lifetime Achievement Award, presented to him by Bonnie Raitt, and BritainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s coveted Ivor Novello Award, and he was awarded an honorary doctorate by Aberdeen University in his ancestral Scotland.

Oh, and there was that Order of the British Empire (OBE), bestowed upon him by Queen Elizabeth for service to music, summing up the whole artistic package.
